thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 4 of 259
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: We are enjoying the service. It is nice not having to plan meals or shopping lists, and the meals have taken me out of my comfort zone. My kids enjoy the meals as well, which is definitely a pleasant surprise. On the downside, the prep takes a little longer than the recipes indicate; for example, most recipes say prep takes 10 minutes, but I find more time is often required. Factoring in extra prep time required some adjustment at first, especially when on a time crunch. I also find the instructions use an inordinate amount of materials (i.e., several bowls, pans, pots, etc.) so that there is a lot to clean afterward. All in all I am happy with the service and would recommend it with those caveats.
